name: @mongodb-js/bson-compilers
description: Source to source compilers using ANTLR
author: Anna Herlihy <anna@mongodb.com>

scripts.compile: npm run antlr4-js && npm run antlr4-java && npm run antlr4-cs
scripts.antlr4-cs: java -Xmx500M -cp '/usr/local/lib/antlr-4.7.1-complete.jar:$CLASSPATH' org.antlr.v4.Tool  -Dlanguage=JavaScript -lib grammars -o lib -visitor -Xexact-output-dir grammars/CSharpLexer.g4 -Xexact-output-dir grammars/CSharpParser.g4
scripts.antlr4-java: java -Xmx500M -cp '/usr/local/lib/antlr-4.7.1-complete.jar:$CLASSPATH' org.antlr.v4.Tool  -Dlanguage=JavaScript -lib grammars -o lib -visitor  -Xexact-output-dir grammars/JavaLexer.g4 grammars/JavaParser.g4
